marker.headline: In de Wildeman, a famous beerpub
marker.body: Situated in a former Amsterdam distillery, In de Wildeman offers an ideal opportunity to enjoy your beer in an authentic environment.

marker.headline: Café Jos Meesterschenkerij
marker.body: This pub is the 2009 number 1 pub in The Netherlands according to the official pub top 100! Be sure to visit this one.

contents.content: Here I will try and explain how everything fits together.

tip.text: Tip 1. Amsterdam - In de Wildeman, a famous pub with a nice collection of Belgian beers
Tip 2. Nijmegen - Café Jos. This pub is the number 1 pub on the hotlist!

contents.content:
And my explanation will probably continue here.
Don't know yet what I'm going to tell you here but I'll figure it out.

And some more room for explanations.
Well, it's probably some work to explain the whole thing so I will be typing something here too I guess...
